Source.Name: akonadi-calendar
Source.Summary: Library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KCalCore library
Source.Description: Akonadi Calendar is a library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KCalCore library. It provides jobs, models and other helpers to make working with events and calendars through Akonadi easier.

Package.Name: akonadi-calendar

Package.Description: Akonadi Calendar is a library that effectively bridges the type-agnostic API of the Akonadi client libraries and the domain-specific KCalCore library. It provides jobs, models and other helpers to make working with events and calendars through Akonadi easier.
